title: Handle In-Game Name Violation
description: A player's username is reported for being offensive and violating the code of conduct.

tasks.description: Retrieve the player report and the reported username.
Compare the username against the code of conduct's naming policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the name is a violation.

tasks.description: Force the player's username to be reset to a generic, temporary name.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully resets the player's name.

tasks.description: Issue a warning to the player and inform them they must choose a new, appropriate name.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a notification to the player's account.
